import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import {SearchOutlined} from '@ant-design/icons' import MovieCard from './components/MovieCard' import './App.css' import { Typography } from 'antd' import axios from 'axios' function App() { const [movies,setMovies] = React.useState([]); useEffect(async() => { const moviesdata = await axios.get('http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=[yourkey]&') }) return (
MovieVilla
) } export default App
